title: Remco Evenepoel vows to match ‘unbelievable level’ of Vingegaard, Pogačar ahead of Tour de France 2024
content:
Evenepoel dismisses transfer rumors as 'small bullshit', rates his form for title defences at San Sebastián, road worlds, Vuelta a España.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel vows to match ‘unbelievable level’ of Vingegaard, Pogačar ahead of Tour de France 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
